description: He's been a Republican, an Independent, and a Democrat; now former Rhode Island Gov. Lincoln Chafee wants to be a president.
title: Democrat Chafee to Announce for President on Wednesday
title_page: Democrat Chafee to Announce for President on Wednesday | Breitbart
text:
According to reports, Chafee will announce his bid for the Democrat nomination during a speech at George Mason University in Virginia.
Chafee surprised many when he formed an exploratory committee in April. He has never won elected office as a Democrat and had only discussed his plans with a few family members and supporters. But after that, he said he was likely to announce his candidacy in June.
Former [Governor], once a Republican, then an independent, then a Democrat, plans to announce his candidacy for the Democratic presidential nomination next week.
He’s a distinct longshot. By his own admission, he’s not been actively raising money or building the organization needed for a credible bid for the nomination, although he’s traveled to the early-voting states of New Hampshire and South Carolina.
